About

Xiao Yu

Xiao Yu is a software engineering student in Shanghai Jiao Tong University and joined Microsoft as an intern in 2013. Hoping to use what he learn to workout some cool stuff, he now works on Jquery APIs and android frameworks.

He is on Github, and can be get in touch via email.

Hope you can have fun here.
